title: Game doesn`t start after launching
body:
Since yesterday my game doesnt start anymore.
I am able to open the Client, but when i click "play" nothing happens. (client closes but nothing new comes up)
I tried to uninstall the game but it still doesnt work.
I am using Windows 10.
Please help me.

replies.body:
It is entirely possible that your patcher might be corrupted that is making it so it doesn't properly launch after you press play.  In order to get this fixed, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434).  There are a fair amount of steps there, but it should resolve the issue with the patcher and get you into the Loading Screen!

Let me know if it doesn't seem to help!
